revised_title: Hugo de Vries: A Pioneer of Genetics and His Contributions to Science
tldr: Hugo de Vries was a prominent botanist and pioneer in the field of genetics. He made significant contributions to the understanding of heredity, plant physiology, and the concept of mutations. De Vries introduced the term "gene" and developed the Mutation Theory, which became a foundational aspect of modern genetics. His work with the plant Oenothera Lamarckiana led to the discovery of new forms and variations, furthering our understanding of plant inheritance and evolution.
